require_admin: This plugin requires admin privileges or higher.
require_mod: This plugin requires mod privileges or higher.
welcomeT: > *Welcome messages* are now *enabled* in this chat.
botsT: `>` *Bots* are now allowed in this chat.
noBotsT: `>` Bots are not allowed in this chat.
voiceT: `>` *Voice messages* are now *allowed* in this chat.
noVoiceT: `>` *Voice messages* are *not allowed* in this chat.
infoT: `>` *Photo/title* can be changed in this chat.
noInfoT: `>` *Photo/title* can't be changed in this chat.
forwardT: `>` *Forward messages* is now *allowed* in this chat.
noForwardT: `>` *Forward messages* is not *allowed* in this chat.
floodTime: `>` *Flood time* check has been set to
floodMax: `>` *Max flood* messages have been set to
langUpdated: Your language has been updated to:
linkError: `>` Need *creator rights* to export chat invite link.
noRules: `>` *There are no visible rules* in this group.
defaultRules:
*Chat rules:*
`>` No Flood.
`>` No Spam.
`>` Try to stay on topic.
`>` Forbidden any racist, sexual, gore content...

_Repeated failure to comply with these rules will cause ban._
modEmpty: *Mod list is empty* in this chat.
error2: Error: must be a supergroup and admin of the chat.
gbanLua: users globally banned from LUA file!
gbanJson: users globally banned from JSON file!
unbanUser: `>` The user `$id` has been *removed* from *ban list.*
ungbanUser: `>` The user `$id` has been *removed* from *global ban list.*
errorNoPlug: The plugin does not exists or has not usages.
privateMSG: `>` Sorry, this command only works *in a private chat with the bot.*
privateSuper: `>` Group created, migrated to supergroup and promoted to admin!
commands:1: #commands: Show all commands for every plugin.
export_gban:1: #gbans installer: Return a lua file installer to share gbans and add those in another bot in just one command.
export_gban:2: #gbans list: Return an archive with a list of gbans.
gban_installer:1: #install gbans: add a list of gbans into your redis db.
welcome:1: #setwelcome [text for welcome]. You can make a custom welcome for this chat. Put a "0" to set the default welcome.
welcome:2: #getwelcome - returns the current welcome in this chat
welcome:3: #welcome on/off - enable/disable welcome in this chat
id:1: #id (or reply): Return your ID and the chat id if you are in one.
moderation:1: #kick <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be kicked in the current chat.
moderation:2: #ban <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be banned in the current chat and it wont be able to return.
moderation:3: #unban <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be unbanned in the current chat.
moderation:4: #gban <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be banned from all chats and it wont be able to enter.
moderation:5: #ungban <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be unbanned from all chats.
moderation:6: #mute <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be silenced in the current chat, erasing all its messages.
moderation:7: #unmute <reply>/<id>/<username>: the user will be unsilenced in the current chat.
settings:1: #tgservices on/off: when disabled, all telegram service messages will be cleared.
settings:2: #invite on/off: when disabled, all new invited participants will be cleared.
settings:3: #lang <language (en, es...)>: changes the language of the bot.
settings:4: #photos on/off: when disabled, all photos will be cleared.
settings:5: #bots on/off: when disabled, if someone adds a bot, it will be kicked.
settings:6: #stickers on/off: when disabled, all stickers will be cleared.
settings:7: #gifs on/off: when disabled, all gifs will be cleared.
settings:8: #voice on/off: when disabled, all voicess will be cleared.
settings:9: #audios on/off: when disabled, all audios will be cleared.
settings:10: #documents on/off: when disabled, all documents will be cleared.
settings:11: #location on/off: when disabled, all locations will be cleared.
settings:12: #games on/off: when disabled, all games will be cleared.
settings:13: #spam on/off: when disabled, all spam messages will be cleared.
settings:14: #forward on/off: when disabled, all forwarded messages will be cleared.
settings:15: #floodtime <secs>: set the time that bot uses to check flood. Set 0 to desactivate.
settings:16: #maxflood <msgs>: set the maximum messages in a floodtime to be considered as flood. Set 0 to desactivate.
settings:17: #links on/off: when disabled, all links will be cleared.
settings:18: #arabic on/off: when disabled, all messages with arabic/persian will be cleared.
settings:19: #english on/off: when disabled, all messages with english letters will be cleared.
settings:20: #emoji on/off: when disabled, all messages with emoji will be cleared.
